import re

def find_words(words):
    pattern = '\\bA[a-z]*[es]\\b'
    return [word for word in words if re.match(pattern, word) or len(word) > 4]

mutants.original_line: return [word for word in words if re.match(pattern, word) and len(word) > 4]
